text:
Dude, I don't give a sh*t what those douches
say.

Those shares aren't worth the tampons
they're printed on.

Uh. What floor? Tell them to stick it in

I'm on the phone, guy.
No, I understand that, but.

Pearson Specter Litt, what business do you
have with Jesus Christ?
Lick my balls. What'd you just say to me?
Hold on. Skidmarks.

Comprende? All right, man, I got a jet.
We're settling into our new digs today.
All right. Later broseph stalin.
Excuse me. Uh, hi.
I couldn't help but overhear.
It must be some mistake.

We're leasing space to the satellite
division of the Stevens Investment Group.
That's me, pal Stu Buzzini.
I run the satellite division.

Well, that wasn't made clear to me when I
met your boss.

Old man River, he's not going to drag his
ass in here every day.
He's got one foot in the grave.

Well, then, did he share with you the lease
agreement?
Because it clearly outlined the dress code.
You think I wore this to work?

What am I, an a******? Next time you see me,
I'll be in a suit three times more expensive
than yours. This is a Brioni.
It's a bruschetta, as far as I'm concerned.
Come on, buddy, give me some.
Come on, bro, don't leave me hanging.
I don't. That's my girl.

I'm just kidding. Sally. Hey, holler at me
if you need anything, okay?
I'm looking forward to being douche mates.
Sh*t stick, huh?
You get that girl's number last night?
That's right. Ballsack.
How did you track us down, man?
I thought we fired you.
Holy god damn sh*t. What have I done?
Come on, boys, let's make some money.
Donna, listen to me, I know.
Then you know that I- Sh*t the
bed like you never have before.
I am so- bang the monkey screwed the pooch.
Donna, please. Flank the flank.

What does flank the flank mean? It means I'm
not finished enjoying this.

When do you think you'll be finished? Because
I need to know what to do.
I don't know when does their lease expire?
Oh my God.
I cooked in an extension option.

Louis, relax. The important thing to remember
here is that this is your fault for not
listening to me.
How does that help me?
It doesn't. It helps me, Donna.
Okay, listen to me.

If you really want my help, I'm going to
give it to you.

What's going to happen is sometime in the
next 24 hours, a minor incident that would

mean nothing to anybody else but you is
going to make you want to undo this fiasco.
I want to undo it right now.
I'm telling you not to.

Because in addition to making things worse,
Jessica will kill you.
So just wait things out.

And in another. I'm sorry. When does their
lease expire?
Again?
18 months. 18 months.
This whole thing will be a distant memory.
Can you do that?
Can you let it go?
Hmm. Yes, I think you can.
You can do it.
Yes I can.
Then go forth and conquer.

I'm going to give him about an hour and a
half.
Juice. Prune juice.
You are so sweet.

I love you all the way from my head down to
my God damn it!
Hey, guy, what can you do for me?
The name isn't

Guy, it's Louis. And I had a two gallon
bottle of prune juice in the refrigerator.
I want to know where it went.
No problem. I had to toss that sh*t.
You threw away my prune juice.
Let me put it this way.
If my a****** had an a******.
That's what it would smell like.
That's what it's supposed to smell like.
Take it easy, bro. It's just prune juice.
No, it
isn't just prune juice.
It's the sanctity of my kitchen.
And on top of my prune juice.
You ate all of my bran bars.
You must spend a
lot of time on the sh*tter.
That's neither here nor there.

You, sir, are in violation of subsection
three C of your lease.

Which means if it happens again, you're out
on your ass.
What?

What kind of d**** puts bran bars and prune
juice in a lease agreement?
This d****.
This d**** right here.
Are you nuts?
No.
I'm your worst nightmare.

Because this quivering, angry d**** isn't
going away until it gets its satisfaction.
What did you just say to me?

I just said this d**** is going to be in your
face, slapping it around, then up your a**,

marching you right out the door if it
catches you in violation of your lease ever

again. What the g****** hell is going on in
here?
It's looking good, isn't it?

Okay buddy, you just signed your death
warrant.
I gave you 30 days.
Now you've got 30 minutes.
I don't think that's happening, boss.

Not only are we staying, but we're making
your beloved bullpen the center of our

operations. Because your big bro amended our
lease.

This is bullsh*t. Why the hell would Harvey
do that?
Let's just say I helped him out of a jam.
This isn't over. It's whatever Harvey did.
He doesn't know contracts like I do.
And you don't know him like I know him.

Because this new lease is tighter than your
mom's ass.

That's it. I am suing you for slander because
my mom's ass is miles from tight.

I'll take your word for it, bro, and bring it
on.

Because you may be a Harvard educated
lawyer, but I'm a Yale educated lawyer.

And the difference between me and you is, I
know the real money is in trading.
Now get the hell out of my bullpen.
